text: 15:27 Rom 9:4; 11:17; 1 Korin 9:11; Galesia 6:6Me uan ifongiamra an gɨn ghua kamaghɨn ami. Kar guizbangɨra, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, me Israelɨn gumazamizir onganarazibar akurvaghamin ingangarim iti. Guizbangɨra, Israelia fomɨra Godɨn bizir aghuir avɨriba isa Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibagh anigha men duabar akura. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba ikarvaghamin bizim iti, me nguazir kamɨn bizir aghuiba isɨ Israelia danɨngɨva me ikarvagham.
